thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com
thread.title: Von F.

author: Von F.
title: Von F.
text:
The quality was better than advertised. None of the stores near me had the right size shaft on their casters and the local sources had a lesser quality caster. Servicecaster came up in a search for casters so a chance was taken.
The order was promptly processed and shipped. The box seemed a bit heavier than expected. That's proved to be because the casters had much more metal than the almost-all-plastic variety than were locally available.
To Quote: The Terminator I'll be back.
